comment._content: Barrel-chested sonofagun, wasn't he? Quite a character, too, apparently: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=980CE6D71239E333A...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Georg Lurich (April 22, 1876 - January 20, 1920) was a prominent Estonian Greco-Roman and free-style wrestler of the early 20th century. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Georg_Lurich
